issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
When StoragePolicy cmd is used with -fs option -- 
Following Error is thrown --

 {color: red} hdfs storagepolicies -fs hdfs://hacluster -listPolicies
Can't understand command '-fs' {color}
Usage: bin/hdfs storagepolicies 
....
fields.summary: cacheadmin,cryptoadmin and storagepolicyadmin should support generic options

comments.body: +1 for the quick fix, [~brahmareddy]. But I am concerning one point: the users might not know to use this command option since '-fs' is a generic option and not be documented in subcommand like {{hdfs storagepolicies}} . Now this option is missing in documentation under Hadoop-Common. I have makes a quick fix in HADOOP-13883. Would you also have a review for that? Thanks.

bq.I have makes a quick fix in HADOOP-13883. Would you also have a review for that? Thanks.
it's nice catch, I reviewed and committed to trunk.upon your confirmation will commit to branch-2 and branch-2.8 also..

bq.+1 for the quick fix
Thanks for your review..Testfailures are unrelated..will wait for binding +1 to commit.

{code}
hdfs storagepolicies
Usage: bin/hdfs storagepolicies [COMMAND]
          [-listPolicies]
          [-setStoragePolicy -path <path> -policy <policy>]
          [-getStoragePolicy -path <path>]
          [-unsetStoragePolicy -path <path>]
          [-help <command-name>]
{code}

Should we also print GenericCommandUsage?

Other than that, +1

This message was automatically generated.
[~liuml07] can you check the latest patch..May be while committing I can fix the checkstyle Or I can upload new patch.Testfailures are unrelated..

+1

Failing tests are not related. Specially, {{TestTrashWithSecureEncryptionZones}} and {{TestTrashWithSecureEncryptionZones}} are are related to [HADOOP-13890].

I have committed to {{trunk}} and {{branch-2}} branches. When committing, I fixed the trivial checkstyle warnings. Thanks [~brahmareddy] for contribution; thanks [~linyiqun] for reviewing this.

Feel free to get this land on {{branch-2.8}} if you think it's nice to have. I'm +0 on that.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #10988 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/10988/])
